front.title: Variable Length Subnet Table For IPv4

author.organization: University of Southern California, Information Sciences Institute

abstract.t: This memo clarifies issues surrounding subnetting IP networks by providing a standard subnet table. This table includes subnetting for Class A, B, and C networks, as well as Network IDs, host ranges and IP broadcast addresses with emphasis on Class C subnets.
This memo is intended as an informational companion to Subneting RFCand the Hosts Requirements RFC.
